ygData.subject: Re: Getting our Concerns Noticed
ygData.msgSnippet: I wouldnt mind to send in some mass feedback so maybe we ll get response on some issues. Trian Unholy Cazic Thule server Subject: [shadowknight] Getting our
ygData.messageBody:
I wouldnt mind to send in some mass feedback so maybe we'll get response on
some issues.

Trian Unholy
Cazic Thule server

Subject: [shadowknight] Getting our Concerns Noticed


>From: Countess Bathory <countess_bathory_69@...>
>
>I know I've plagued you poor people with my opinions aplenty as of
>late, so I won't drag you thru them again, at least not yet.
>
>But, I would like to know others opinions on how we should bring our
>concerns to the people who just might actually do something about it.
>
>My idea is to do a massive in-game /feedback on a Friday or Saturday
>night with all willing SKs on all servers.
>
>I am open to all other ideas of course.
>
>Bathory
>Cazic-Thule
